00012 @interface PrefsWindowController : SSPrefsWindowController
00013 {
00014     IBOutlet NSArrayController* browfilesArrayController ;
00015 
00016         IBOutlet NSTextField* bookwatchmanStatus ;
00017         // In 4.2.4, I had bound this to the ivar bookwatchmanStatus.
00018         // But it turned out to be not a good idea because, since bookwatchmanStatus
00019         // this is a computed value and not a "real" ivar, it had to be updated
00020         // using manual bindings; i.e. 
00021         //   [self willChangeValueForKey:@"bookwatchmanStatus"] ;       
00022         //   [self didChangeValueForKey:@"bookwatchmanStatus"] ;
00023         // But then in the Cocoa Bindings session at WWDC 2007, I was warned not to do this:
00024         // "Do not send willChangeValueForKey:  and didChangeValueForKey: if you didn't really change the value.
00025         // This may work today, but it may not work tomorrow, and also it can cause a crash."
00026         // Since the enableDisableBookwatchmanAsNeededNotification: may or may not be successful, this would be
00027         // difficult.  So, I went back to using this old-fashioned outlet in 4.2.5.
00028         
00029         IBOutlet NSTableView* tableBookmarksDocuments ;
00030         IBOutlet NSTableView* tableGeneral ;
00031         IBOutlet NSTableView* tableOpen ;
00032         IBOutlet NSTableView* tableView ;
00033         IBOutlet NSTableView* tableSortingOrder ;
00034         IBOutlet NSTableView* tableTranslating ;
00035         IBOutlet NSTableView* tableBookwatchman ;
00036         
00037 }
